achievements.title: Winner at AICamp Generative AI Hackathon
achievements.description: Won the AWS for Startups prize for creating a multimodal AI assistant that automates browser tasks on behalf of users.

achievements.title: Developed Microservices Video to MP3 Converter
achievements.description: Engineered a distributed system for converting video files to MP3 format using microservices architecture, implementing secure JWT user authentication, message queuing with RabbitMQ, scalable storage, and notifications.

achievements.title: Implemented Apache Kafka Pub-Sub
achievements.description: Implemented Apache Kafka producers/consumers using Confluent Cloud with topic management and data serialization, showcasing cross-platform compatibility.

achievements.title: Developed Classic To-Do List Application
achievements.description: Built a full-stack task manager webapp with CRUD operations using React and Go with PostgreSQL, and implemented GraphQL API for efficient data retrieval, deployed on AWS with self-signed SSL certificate for HTTPS.

achievements.title: Engineered Voice AI Interviewer Agent
achievements.description: Developed an AI-powered voice interviewer utilizing Groq for fast inference and Vapi for voice interactions, with an evaluation system using custom metrics and Supabase for authentication and storage.

achievements.title: Designed Cloud-based Video Face Recognition App
achievements.description: Designed a 3-tier hybrid cloud architecture leveraging AWS and OpenStack for web, app, and data tiers integration, with Python scripts for Lambda triggers, S3, DynamoDB; and auto-scaled 20 EC2 instances via SQS and Cloudwatch.

achievements.title: Embedded C++ Developer Internship
achievements.description: Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device to measure subzero temperatures, troubleshooted bugs, and optimized the system for real-time sensor data via RPC transfer protocols.

achievements.title: Modeled Discrete Mathematical Rough Set Theory
achievements.description: Successfully modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for Sensor Data Mining using Python and designed a custom-built library to process 65,536 objects in 2 minutes with 95% accuracy using linear regression.
